key.name: panel-position
key.description: Set the panel position. Can be "Left", "Right", "Top" and "Down"

key.name: panel-expand
key.description: Panel expand to all screen width or height.

key.name: panel-space-reserved
key.sumary: Reserve screen space for the dock
key.description: Reserve space in the screen for the panel. No application can be over the panel.

key.name: panel-animation-step-size
key.sumary: Step size for the panel animation
key.description: The higher the step, the less time animation and vice versa.
